items.sentence: The police were at the scene before Tom arrived.

The supermarket is open Monday through Saturday.
I\'m waiting for Tom to finish what he\'s doing.
If you don\'t take a vacation, you\'ll collapse.
I\'ve never seen anything like it in my country.
Tom wasn\'t surprised that Mary wasn\'t on time.
Tom asked for Mary\'s permission to leave early.
Somebody might\'ve overheard you talking to Tom.
Someone must\'ve taken your umbrella by mistake.
Tom and Mary weren\'t at home yesterday evening.
I should\'ve realized the truth a long time ago.

I decided to stay a couple extra days in Boston.

Tom\'s not coming, because I don\'t want him to.
Tom\'s problems are nothing compared to Mary\'s.
